DOC.brief_summary: This study design demonstrate formoterol 12µg 24µg deliver new inhalation device ( Concept1 ) equivalent correspond dose formoterol deliver Aerolizer device term efficacy , patient persistent asthma .
DOC.brief_title: Study Demonstrate Equivalence Formoterol 12 24 µg Delivered Via Two Types Single Dose Dry Powder Inhalers ( Concept1 Aerolizer )
DOC.criteria: History asthma attack Forced expiratory volume 1 second ( measure well lungs work ) great 60 % predict value Asthma stable : patient admit hospital receive emergency room treatment Patients whose asthma drug need change within month prior start study
